A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is by far the worst Star Wars movie yet. Rian Johnson may make things look cool\, but he is a horrible storyteller. The plot was worthless and was essentially comprised of one giant chase scene\, yet somehow two characters managed to go to a casino\, which did nothing whatsoever to move the “plot” along. In addition\, the director decided it was appropriate to throw in a bunch of slapstick “humor”. “Your mom” jokes don’t belong in Star Wars. From the very first scenes\, it’s apparent that the sole aim of this film is to subvert expectations. If only as much time and effort had been put into crafting an interesting\, thoughtful story.
